title: The Zone Fighting Championship - Official Video
description:
The Zone Fighting Championship - Official Video
-----------------------------------------------
The 9th of February 2008
Solnahallen, Stockholm
Sweden

-

On February 9th, at Solnahallen in the Swedish capital Stockholm, MMA returns to Sweden after a long struggle with authorities over regulatory restrictions imposed on the sport. 

The show is essentially a sequel to the popular and well-recognized ÃƒÂ¢??European Vale TudoÃƒÂ¢?? (EVT) events, which took place between 2003 and 2006. EVT helped the careers of fighters such as Travis Lutter, Martin Kampmann and Dennis Siver, and the fight-card for Zone FC continues this tradition by being filled with up and comers, hoping to make a name for themselves.

The 8 fights on the card include fighters from Russia, Holland, Brazil, Germany, Finland, Norway, Lithuania and, of course, Sweden.

Get ready for a spectacular show!

-

Fightcard:

Nicholas Musoke (Sweden) vs. Fredrik Klingsell (Sweden) 
Martin Lavin (Sweden) vs. Srdjan Sekulic (Croatia) 
Johan Antonsson (Sweden) vs. Nathan Schouteren (Holland) 
Tor Troeng (Sweden) vs. Fatih Balci (Germany) 
Klas Akesson (Sweden) vs. Jakob Lovstad (Norway) 
Farbod Fadami (Germany) vs. Alexander Gustavsson (Sweden) 
Sergej Maslobojev (Lithuania) vs. Bruno Carvalho (Brazil)
August Wallen (Sweden) vs. Sergei Bal (Russia)

-

Don&#039;t miss The Zone FC 2, to be held the 10th of May 2008 at Lisebergshallen, Gothenburg, Sweden 

-

www.thezonefc.com
